name: Conveyor Hell
description:
This is "Conveyor Hell", my entry for the jam made in 5 hours with Unity.

CONTROLS

WASD/Arrow Keys : Move Camera

Left Click (on Red Packages) : Destroy Package      

You need to shoot every single red package. No Questions asked.

If you shoot a yellow package, you die. If only one red package survives, you die.

How good of a shot are you?

HOW I MADE THE GAME
